text: Fusinus michaelrogersi is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Fasciolariidae, the spindle snails, the tulip snails and their allies. ==Description== ==Distribution== F. michaelrogersi can be found in Pacific waters, ranging from Hawaii to Midway Island.Snyder, Martin Avery. Catalogue of the Marine Gastropod Family Fasciolariidae. Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia Special Pub. 21. 2003. 271. ==References== michaelrogersi Category:Gastropods described in 2001
title: Fusinus michaelrogersi
